properties.name: joulesjs.allowedIps
properties.description: Authorize connections originating from the given ips only

properties.name: joulesjs.command
properties.description:
Array containing the command to call when SpringBoot is ready.
%s placeholder will be substituted by the server's url and port

properties.name: joulesjs.allowHeadless
properties.description: Whether the server is allowed to continue running in the background once the process specified by 'joulesjs.command' has finished
